TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ReusableConstraint extends System.Object implements class NUnit.Framework.Constraints.IResolveConstraint

Docs.summary: ReusableConstraint wraps a constraint expression after resolving it so that it can be reused consistently.

Docs.summary: Resolves the ReusableConstraint by returning the constraint that it originally wrapped.
